banner.title: Let`s make an
banner.description: Together we can fight poverty and stop the hunger around us. Your donation is the shield to protect the poor from suffering.
banner.description1: By your generous help we will stand together against poverty and hunger, and it is appreciated.
banner.description2: We are the right choice for your donation. We will guarantee your donation reach the right place.
banner.description3: Your donation will shape your smile and make poor people happy. Don`t underestimate your donation.
banner.description4: We have the elite as a volunteers, they know what they are doing and they value what you wish for.
